segment.source: How to Deploy the MBAM Client by Using a Command Line
segment.target: How to Deploy the MBAM Client by Using a Command Line

segment.source: How to Deploy the MBAM Client by Using a Command Line
segment.target: How to Deploy the MBAM Client by Using a Command Line

segment.source: How to Deploy the MBAM Client by Using a Command Line
segment.target: How to Deploy the MBAM Client by Using a Command Line

segment.source: You can use a command line to deploy the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Client software.
segment.target: You can use a command line to deploy the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) Client software.

segment.source: Command Line to deploy the MBAM Client software
segment.target: Command Line to deploy the MBAM Client software

segment.source: Type the following command at the command prompt to automatically accept the end user license agreement when deploying the MBAM Client software.
segment.target: Type the following command at the command prompt to automatically accept the end user license agreement when deploying the MBAM Client software.

segment.source: MBAMClientSetup.exe /acceptEula=Yes
segment.target: MBAMClientSetup.exe /acceptEula=Yes

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The /ju and /jm command-line options are not supported and cannot be used to install the MBAM Client software.
segment.target: The /ju and /jm command-line options are not supported and cannot be used to install the MBAM Client software.

segment.source: Type the following command at the command prompt to extract and install the MSP:
segment.target: Type the following command at the command prompt to extract and install the MSP:

segment.source: MBAMClientSetup.exe /extract path to extract MSI /acceptEula=Yes
segment.target: MBAMClientSetup.exe /extract path to extract MSI /acceptEula=Yes

segment.source: Then, install the MSI silently by running the following command:
segment.target: Then, install the MSI silently by running the following command:

segment.source: msiexec /i path to extracted MSI /qb ALLUSERS=1 REBOOT=ReallySuppress
segment.target: msiexec /i path to extracted MSI /qb ALLUSERS=1 REBOOT=ReallySuppress

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Beginning in MBAM 2.5 SP1, a separate MSI is no longer included with the MBAM product.
segment.target: Beginning in MBAM 2.5 SP1, a separate MSI is no longer included with the MBAM product.

segment.source: However, you can extract the MSI from the executable file (.exe) that is included with the product, after accepting the EULA.
segment.target: However, you can extract the MSI from the executable file (.exe) that is included with the product, after accepting the EULA.

segment.source: OPTINFORMICROSOFTUPDATES=1 command-line option
segment.target: OPTINFORMICROSOFTUPDATES=1 command-line option

segment.source: You can optionally specify the command-line option during the Client software installation to automatically install Microsoft Updates on client computers.
segment.target: You can optionally specify the command-line option during the Client software installation to automatically install Microsoft Updates on client computers.

segment.source: Specifying this option makes Microsoft Update automatically start and search for available updates to install after the Client software installation finishes.
segment.target: Specifying this option makes Microsoft Update automatically start and search for available updates to install after the Client software installation finishes.

segment.source: You can use this command-line option with either of the following installation methods.
segment.target: You can use this command-line option with either of the following installation methods.

segment.source: Install the MBAM Client software by using
segment.target: Install the MBAM Client software by using

segment.source: Example
segment.target: Example

segment.source: MBAMClientSetup.exe
segment.target: MBAMClientSetup.exe

segment.source: MbamClientSetup.exe OPTIN_FOR_MICROSOFT_UPDATES=1
segment.target: MbamClientSetup.exe OPTIN_FOR_MICROSOFT_UPDATES=1

segment.source: msiexec /i MBAMClient.msi
segment.target: msiexec /i MBAMClient.msi

segment.source: msiexec /i MBAMClient.msi OPTIN_FOR_MICROSOFT_UPDATES=1
segment.target: msiexec /i MBAMClient.msi OPTIN_FOR_MICROSOFT_UPDATES=1
